/* USE : MobileOrderChannelSaleMapper.getDlvrInFgColList */
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT '0' AS DLVR_IN_FG, '일반' AS DLVR_IN_FG_NM FROM DUAL UNION SELECT NMCODE_CD AS DLVR_IN_FG, NMCODE_NM AS DLVR_IN_FG_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '112' ) A ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(A.DLVR_IN_FG)
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT '0' AS DLVR_IN_FG, '일반' AS DLVR_IN_FG_NM, 1 AS RNUM FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '1' AS DLVR_IN_FG, 'CID' AS DLVR_IN_FG_NM, 2 AS RNUM FROM DUAL UNION SELECT * FROM ( SELECT NMCODE_CD AS DLVR_IN_FG, NMCODE_NM AS DLVR_IN_FG_NM, (ROWNUM + 2) AS RNUM FROM TB_HQ_NMCODE WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND NMCODE_GRP_CD = '113' ORDER BY NMCODE_CD ) B ) A ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(A.RNUM)
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT '0' AS DLVR_IN_FG, '일반' AS DLVR_IN_FG_NM, 1 AS RNUM FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '1' AS DLVR_IN_FG, 'CID' AS DLVR_IN_FG_NM, 2 AS RNUM FROM DUAL UNION SELECT * FROM ( SELECT NMCODE_CD AS DLVR_IN_FG, NMCODE_NM AS DLVR_IN_FG_NM, (ROWNUM + 2) AS RNUM FROM TB_MS_STORE_NMCODE WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND NMCODE_GRP_CD = '113' ORDER BY NMCODE_CD ) B ) A ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(A.RNUM)
